aircraft.value: Falcon Prime - AC-9760-489 at Training Center Alpha

defect_observed.value: Hydraulic fluid contamination detected. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Utility Hydraulics component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 05/02/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 08/02/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 07/02/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 08/02/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 10/02/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation

Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Utility Hydraulics component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: D - Due to features inherent in the design
